data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the county of Jamui unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jamui, Bihar, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the county of Jamui to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 19,364 believers in the county of Jamui the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Jamui, Bihar, India to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Ghusuria people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Jesus, call those who are far off in Jamui, Bihar, India, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the county of Jamui.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.section_summary:
the county of Jamui, Bihar, India has a population of 1,760,400.

We estimate Jamui has 19,364 people who might know Jesus, 21,359 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,719,676 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 1,760,400 people living in Jamui.
